DOC.HEADLINE: CAMPAIGN CALENDAR
DOC.TEXT: UPCOMING EVENTS Today : Kevin Ready , Democratic candidate in the 23rd Congressional District , will host a meet-the-candidate session at a private home_in Ojai , 530 El Sol Drive , 7 p.m. Public is invited . Information : 646-1026 . Today : Brooks Firestone , a candidate in the 35th Assembly District , will host a meet-the-candidate session at a private home_in Ventura , 5:30 p.m. For directions and more information : 965-1994 . Today : Mike Markey , a candidate for the Thousand Oaks City_Council , will host a coffee reception at a private home_in Newbury Park , 1237 Comstock , 7 p.m. Information : 499-3393 . Today : Marshall Dixon , a candidate for the Thousand Oaks City_Council , will hold a meet-the-candidate session in the Broadway Court at The Oaks mall , 222 W . Hillcrest Drive , 10 a.m. to 4 p.m. Information : 379-2739 . Saturday : Assemblyman Nao Takasugi ( R-Oxnard ) , who is running_for reelection , will host a dinner fund-raiser at a private home_in Oxnard , 6 to 8 p.m. Donations , $ 50 per person , $ 75 per couple . For directions and more details : 984-1833 . Saturday : Trudi Loh , a candidate for the Ventura County Board of Supervisors , will host a bowling fund-raiser at Conejo Village Bowl , 125 W . Thousand Oaks Blvd. , 5 to 7 p.m. Tickets , $ 15 per person , $ 25 per couple . Information : 379-0806 . Saturday : Bob Valles , a candidate for the board of the Oxnard Union High_School District , will host a barbecue fund-raiser in Oxnard , 776 W . Robert Ave. , 4 to 7 p.m. Tickets , $ 15 per person . Information : 486-0266 . Sunday : Ekbal Quidwai , a candidate for Thousand Oaks City_Council , will hold a meet-the-candidate session at the Broadway Court in The Oaks mall , 222 W . Hillcrest Drive , 11 a.m. to 5 p.m. Information : 378-7274 . Sunday : Greg Cole , a candidate for Thousand Oaks City_Council , will hold a meet-the-candidate session at St . Paschal Baylon Church ' s Family Day . Corner of Moorpark and Janss roads , 2 to 4 p.m. Information : 498-3661 . Sunday : Thousand Oaks City Councilwoman Judy Lazar , who is running_for reelection , will host a barbecue fund-raiser at the Cameron Center , 288 Greenmeadow Drive , 4 to 7 p.m. Tickets , $ 30 per person . Information : 379-4996 . Sunday : Sharon Hushka , a candidate for the board of the Simi Valley Unified School District , will hold a meet-the-candidate hike at Rocky Peak Park , Rocky Peak Road at the Simi Valley Freeway . 4 p.m. Information : 526-4292 . Sunday : Leticia Barajas Alvarez , a candidate for the Oxnard City_Council , will host a breakfast fund-raiser at the Oxnard Community_Center Park , 800 Hobson Way , 8 a.m. to noon . Information : 984-1551 . Sunday : Candidates for the Thousand Oaks City_Council will participate in a question-and-answer forum at St . Matthew ' s United Methodist_Church in Newbury Park , 1360 S . Wendy Dr. , 7 p.m. Information : 498-6910 . Wednesday : Rikki Horne , a candidate for the board of the Ojai Unified School District , will host a meet-the-candidate session at a private home_in Ojai , 7 p.m. For directions and more details : 646-7970 . Thursday : Scott Montgomery , a candidate for the Ventura County Board of Supervisors , will host a reception and dinner fund-raiser at Asadurian Ranch in Moorpark , 11905 Darlene Lane . Guests include state Sen . Cathie Wright ( R-Simi Valley ) , a candidate for lieutenant_governor . Reception , 6 to 8 p.m. , $ 100 per person . Dinner 7:30 p.m. , $ 250 per person . Reservations : 529-6992 . Fax Campaign Calendar submissions to 658-5576 or mail to 5200 Valentine Road , Suite 140 , Ventura , Calif . 93003 . Please include contact name and telephone_number . Deadline is Thursday 4 p.m. for the upcoming week ' s events .
